item.title: My Debian Repository
item.description: Adding repository to your debian distribution: Link to heading Run below command to do this automatically: Link to heading sudo sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://repo.fossfrog.in/setup.sh)" or Link to heading Download fossfrog.gpg file and put under /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d Create a file named “fossfrog.list” under /etc/apt/sources.list.d and put below content in the file: deb https://repo.fossfrog.in stable main Apps present in my repository: Link to heading nethunter network-scanner hijacker

item.title: Donate
item.description: Support My Work Link to heading If you find my work useful and would like to support it, consider making a donation. Link to heading You can also subscribe to my YouTube channel where I post videos on Linux, Android, Kernel and other Linux stuff. (-; Link to heading
